performance_rubric: Quality of donation ask or conversion attempt

quality_signals._description: Detailed quality assessment criteria with examples for AI evaluation

universal_quality.description: Friendly greeting; natural tone; establishes human connection early.
Acknowledges supporter statements; avoids interrupting; responds to cues.
Uses supporter name or contextual details when available.
Explains actions, next steps, and outcomes clearly.
Keeps conversation focused; smooth transitions; clear close summary.
Consistently respectful, calm and friendly language.
Identifies and responds appropriately to high-risk vulnerability or capacity issues.
No profanity, insults, arguments, sarcasm, or hostile behaviour.

gift_aid.trigger_terms: gift aid; reclaim tax; HMRC; 25p; 25%; declaration
gift_aid.minimum_components: Eligibility (UK tax paid); explicit supporter consent; basic explanation of charity reclaim benefit.
gift_aid.soft_fail_examples: Impact explanation missing but eligibility and consent present.
gift_aid.hard_fail_examples: No consent; no eligibility check; incorrect explanation of reclaim process.
gift_aid.ai_handling: Only evaluate when Gift Aid mentioned. Otherwise mark as N/A.

vulnerability_capacity.definition: General cost hesitation without impaired decision-making.
vulnerability_capacity.examples: Money is tight; can't afford much; maybe later.
vulnerability_capacity.ai_action: Treat as standard objection; selling allowed using affordability techniques.

vulnerability_capacity.definition: Emotional or situational stress that requires softer approach.
vulnerability_capacity.ai_action: Increase empathy expectation; adjust approach but fundraising still allowed if appropriate.

vulnerability_capacity.tier: Tier 3 – High confidence vulnerability or lack of capacity
vulnerability_capacity.definition: Clear cognitive impairment, intoxication, inability to understand transaction, or reliance on third party for finances.
vulnerability_capacity.examples: Brain injury; dementia; intoxicated; carer manages finances.
vulnerability_capacity.ai_action: Safeguarding trigger; stop fundraising activity; escalate.

howlers.action: Immediate flag; exclude from client samples.

objection_handling.definition: Recognise and label the objection using active listening.
Acknowledge concern and maintain engagement before pitching solution.
Apply correct rebuttal or reassurance strategy.
Move confidently to next action or close.

objection_library.goal: Reframe regularity; offer smaller amount; maintain dignity.

objection_library.objection: Don't want to give bank/card details
objection_library.goal: Explain security; Direct Debit Guarantee; recording pause.
Explain value of regular support; offer low monthly alternative.

rapport_cues.expected_response: Acknowledge and link naturally if cause-relevant.
Acknowledge time constraint; tighten call structure.

rapport_cues.cue: Mentions personal interest aligned to charity cause
rapport_cues.expected_response: Explore connection briefly; link to impact.
